question: When did Beyonce start becoming popular?

understand.analysis: The question asks when Beyoncé began becoming popular. The infographic contains a middle section text stating rise to fame in the late 1990s associated with Destiny's Child [U1] and supporting group imagery [U2]. These elements together indicate the time she started becoming popular.

Together these elements state when Beyoncé began to become popular: the late 1990s.
